description: Yes, you read that right. This ridiculous attachment is effectively a rectangle that holds up to 5 arrows and places the last one into firing position when the bow's string is nocked. It additionally includes a Picatinny rail and a thumb-trigger bow release, helping with dispersion and handling. Only fits on modern compound bows.

description: A rather silly answer to the problem of the semi-auto AR-15, this grip has a retractable crank connected to a pin inside the grip that hits the action, effectively turning the gun into a hand-crank gatling gun.
